generalContextPrompt.name: General Context
generalContextPrompt.description: Provide some general context that you want to inform the AI about for all chat requests. E.g. Your background, skills, expertise, interests, work, values, goals, priorities.
generalContextPrompt.prePrompt: Take the following general context into consideration if relevant and appropriate when responding

responseStylePrompt.name: Response Style
responseStylePrompt.description: Provide some guidelines for the AI to follow when responding to chat requests. E.g. Be concise, clear, friendly, professional, respectful, empathetic, supportive, encouraging, positive, constructive, informative, accurate, relevant, helpful, creative, original, engaging
responseStylePrompt.prePrompt: Respond in a style that follows these guidelines

customSystemPrompt.name: Custom System Prompt
customSystemPrompt.description: Provide an additional system prompt to be included with each chat request.
